title: The Market
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile 20L
description: A farmer's market is a place where people can shop outdoors. In The Market, readers will learn about the many different things that can be seen at a farmer's market. Detailed, colorful photographs and a repetitive text structure support early emergent readers. This book can also be used to teach students how to connect to prior knowledge and to capitalize the beginning of sentences.
reviewWords: cookies, farmers, jam, market, tents, vegetables
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Initial and Final Sounds : Discriminate initial consonant /m/ sound
grammar: Capitalization                : Capitalize the beginnings of sentences
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word the
